skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a significant distance.

skills.name: Jumping Strike
skills.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

skills.name: Crashing Drive
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

skills.name: Spear Flurry
skills.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to a single target.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

skills.name: Flying Kick
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.

skills.name: Lunging Smash
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Pick up the target, then smash it into the ground and suspend it, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: Spear Dance
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and grab the target and shake them multiple times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target.

Tap normal attack during the short period of time after a dodge to trigger Worldsplitter, unleashing <shuzhi>3</> shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and suspending the targets.
While in Outburst mode, fire <shuzhi>5</> shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending the target.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: Outburst
skills.description:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and creating an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).

skills.name: Overwhelming Maul
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. When a weapon's normal attack or a dodge attack hits, <shuzhi>1</> parasol spawns near the target for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Up to <shuzhi>3</> parasols may be active at any given time.
<shuzhi>Fiery Crash</>: During Devastating Glide, for each parasol passed through, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK multiplied by the number of Polyfeather Parasol.
<shuzhi>Corrosion</>: Targets near the parasols take <shuzhi>10%</> more flame damage and <shuzhi>12%</> more damage from charged attacks.
<shuzhi>Radiant Flames</>: Parasols deal burn damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Flame Vortex</>: Active parasols consume <shuzhi>1</> feather every second and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> (damage and feather cost from multiple parasols don't stack).

skills.name: Vermilion Domain
skills.description:
While using Devastating Glide, pass through 3 parasols before returning to the original position to gain Vermilion Domain, which grants a <shuzhi>30%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>8</> seconds.
While diving, Vermilion Domain deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area every second and increases the Wanderer's speed by <shuzhi>30%</>.

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and cast Sleight of Hand and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. After swinging the whip, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target.

skills.name: Grand Illusion
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Grand Illusion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: Basic Technique
skills.description:
While on the ground, use Mobius to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target down.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and drag and drop the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.
Increase shatter by an additional <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: Air Combo
skills.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

skills.name: Out of the Blue
skills.description: While using Basic Technique on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Out of the Blue directly based on the currently locked-on target. Smaller locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Larger locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and draw in nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: Stage Rotation
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target.

skills.name: Close-up Magic
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack on the ground to charge Anticipation, and release the button to trigger Close-up Magic based on the currently locked-on target. Smaller locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Larger locked-on targets are dealt damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and draw in nearby targets. This skill's shatter is additionally increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.

skills.name: It's Magic Time
skills.description:
Dealing damage with any weapon in the main slot will accrue <shuzhi>warmup points</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.06</> seconds. Physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>1</> point with each hit, and non-physical weapons accrue <shuzhi>0.5</> points with each hit. The number of <shuzhi>warmup points</> you have are displayed in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>, up to <shuzhi>100</> points. When entering battle, immediately gain <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</>.
Skills can be cast once there are <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>warmup points</> in the <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</>. Pull together enemies in a certain area and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss) and reduce the speed of targets within the hit area (unavailable in Apex League and The Critical Abyss). At the same time, activate <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> to continuously consume <shuzhi>warmup points</> for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. This cooldown is not affected by effects (including the clearance, reset, or change of the cooldown time) that are not from Mobius. During this time, the skill button is replaced with a Cut Card button.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, automatically get either a <shuzhi>Spade</> or <shuzhi>Heart</> <shuzhi>Poker Card</> every 2 seconds. The type of <shuzhi>Poker Card</> that is about to be obtained can be switched in advance with the Cut Card button. When there are <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Poker Cards</>, the corresponding <shuzhi>Card Magic</> will be automatically used. Cooldown: <shuzhi>3.8</> seconds.
During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, you gain hyperbody and are considered as having a shield. Your <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> will also no longer be automatically replenished. Increase the physical damage of Mobius's attacks (normal attack and dodge attack) by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>.
Different <shuzhi>Poker Card</> combinations will activate different <shuzhi>Card Magic</> effects.
Heart + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Psychic Puppet</>
Heart + Heart → <ComLblGreen>Contradiction Corrosion</>
Spade + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Card Sweep</>
<shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends when switching to another weapon in any way or upon being defeated.
Gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>20</> seconds when Magic Trick ends. If it ends naturally, it deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>1,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

skills.name: Psychic Puppet
skills.description: Pull out a colony of bats from your hat and enhance yourself. During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, physical damage dealt by Mobius is increased by <shuzhi>7.5%</>, and only <shuzhi>60%</> of the damage taken will be tallied. The remaining <shuzhi>40%</> will slowly be deducted from your HP over <shuzhi>10</> seconds after <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends. The delayed tally effect only applies when Fortitude Resonance is not active.

skills.name: Contradiction Corrosion
skills.description: Immediately recover <shuzhi>10%</> of Max HP and plant a Corrosion Flower on up to <shuzhi>7</> targets within a certain range, which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every second for<shuzhi>3</> seconds.

skills.name: Card Sweep
skills.description: Summon a large number of flying cards, forming a hurricane that swarms to the target location, attacking the target up to <shuzhi>12</> times and dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

skills.name: Capped Knowledge
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and launching the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

skills.name: Snowy Flurry
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Snowy Flurry, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

skills.name: Winter Solstice
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Winter Solstice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets.

skills.name: Withering Cold
skills.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

skills.name: Thaw
skills.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

skills.name: Piercing Cold
skills.description: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Piercing Cold, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

skills.name: Sharp Chill
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Sharp Chill.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch the target.

skills.name: Desolate Day
skills.description:
Deal damage to nearby targets up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and create 2 regulation Speedy Yo-yos. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Reduce the speed of targets within range of Desolate Day by <shuzhi>50%</> (does not affect Wanderers or bosses).
Each Speedy Yo-yo passes through the center of the trajectory about 4 times in each motion cycle, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within the trajectory, for <shuzhi>70</> seconds. The motion cycle lasts for 4 seconds when the weapon is 0 stars. During this period, using Desolate Day will refresh the position and duration of the Speedy Yo-yo. Cooldown: <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
While Desolate Day is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.

skills.name: Return to Loneliness
skills.description:
Use Capped Knowledge to obtain up to <shuzhi>2</> uses of the new skill Return to Loneliness. This skill can only be used while Desolate Day is in cooldown. Deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. While the skill is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any incoming or outgoing healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.
While Fortitude Resonance is active: Use Return to Loneliness and taunt nearby targets to gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of blocking shield, up to <shuzhi>3</> stacks, for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. <shuzhi>Blocking points</> are equal to the <shuzhi>sum of the Wanderer's 5 resistance types</>. When the blocking shield is used up or overflows, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>200% of blocking points</> to the main target.
While Benediction Resonance is active: Using Return to Loneliness against targets with greater than <shuzhi>95%</> HP will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of their respective Max HP (does not affect Wanderers). This cannot be affected by damage boost or reduction effects.

skills.name: Snow-Treading Tiger
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Snow-Treading Tiger can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.

skills.name: Observe & React
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
After Observe & React lands a hit, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After Observe & React lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After using <shuzhi>Unity</> to use a discharge skill, receive <shuzhi>1,000</> weapon charge. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Observe & React can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After dodging while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

skills.name: Impossible Feat
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Impossible Feat, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Impossible Feat can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Sweeping Clouds
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Sweeping Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Sweeping Clouds can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Battering Fist
skills.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and continuously knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.

Battering Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After using any dodge attack while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, use normal attack to quickly trigger the Fourth Attack.
After the Fifth Attack lands a hit while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) and additionally inflict <shuzhi>Chilblain</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. This effect can only be triggered on the same target 1 time every <shuzhi>8</> seconds.

skills.name: Floating Fist
skills.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

Floating Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Forest-Piercing Swallow
skills.description:
Forest-Piercing Swallow can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Then, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the targets back.

After using <shuzhi>Cloud-Soaring Kite</>, using normal attack can also trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.

skills.name: Sky-Dancing Snake
skills.description:
Sky-Dancing Snake can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the fourth to fifth normal attacks to trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspend them.

After using <shuzhi>Forest-Piercing Swallow</>, tapping and holding normal attack can also trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.

skills.name: Frost High & Low
skills.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to sixth normal attacks to trigger Frost High & Low.
Toss your weapon in the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Frost High & Low can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Cloud-Soaring Kite
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Cloud-Soaring Kite.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground and knock them down.

Cloud-Soaring Kite can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Total Rewind
skills.description:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Total Rewind.
Continuously draw in nearby targets while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody.

Total Rewind can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Offense & Defense
skills.description:
<shuzhi>Unity</> has 2 forms: <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> and <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</>. Activate up to <shuzhi>1</> of them via the Skills - Settings page. They cannot be switched while in the combat state.

<shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form: While in the combat state, <shuzhi>Unity's</> dodge attack / normal attack multiplier is additionally increased by <shuzhi>40%</>. After using any weapon's dodge attack or normal attack <shuzhi>3</> times, receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> (up to <shuzhi>10</>). Only <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> can be obtained every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form: After <shuzhi>Observe & React</> lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state and receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>15</>) for <shuzhi>60</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Passive: Chill</>
When <shuzhi>Unity</> is equipped, ignore <shuzhi>15%</> of targets' Frost Resistance. This effect also works in the off-hand slot.

skills.name: Fire in the Hole
skills.description:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
When using Fire in the Hole, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>, Fire in the Hole will deal <shuzhi>1.1</>/<shuzhi>1.4</>/<shuzhi>1.8</>/<shuzhi>2.3</>/<shuzhi>3</> times of its original damage respectively.
After using Fire in the Hole, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After using Fire in the Hole, restore <shuzhi>2</> dodge attempts.

Fire in the Hole can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
When <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> reaches <shuzhi>5</>, reset Fire in the Hole's cooldown.

skills.name: Clashing of Arms
skills.description:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
While in the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state, when using any weapon skill, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, deal additional damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>169%</>/<shuzhi>368%</>/<shuzhi>619%</>/<shuzhi>938%</>/<shuzhi>1,350%</> of ATK, and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> every second for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
After using any frost weapon skill, gain <shuzhi>2</> seconds of hyperbody.

Clashing of Arms can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

skills.name: Way Home
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon Xuanwu, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

skills.name: Open Clouds
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Open Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Open Clouds lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.

skills.name: Cutting Sand
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Cutting Sand, unleashing a sword aura, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Cutting Sand lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.

skills.name: Lookout
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Lookout (unavailable in Apex League).
After the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> summoned by <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</> is completed, use Lookout to enter <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds and gain <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Dark Slashes</>.
After the first successful normal or dodge attack from <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</> lands a hit, trigger <shuzhi>Dark Slash</>. If the target is an ordinary or elite enemy and their current HP doesn't exceed the Wanderer's Max ATK by more than <shuzhi>20,000</> times, the target will be immediately executed. Otherwise, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>1,500%</> of ATK.
<shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> ends when its duration is over, the <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> count is exhausted, or upon switching weapons. <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>200</> seconds.

skills.name: Resistor
skills.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
While the <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</> is active, after Resistor's fifth attack lands its final hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.

skills.name: Absolute Ravine
skills.description:
Split a crack in the ground ahead, gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League), and draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Increase the Wanderer's physical and flame damage by <shuzhi>26%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, and then summon the Xuanwu Totem. The Xuanwu Totem is removed while in the non-combat state.
The Xuanwu Totem summons dark souls from the four formation cores every <shuzhi>0.6</> seconds, each time dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK to targets along the way. When Absolute Ravine is in cooldown, gain the new skill <shuzhi>Mirror Reflection</>: Strike back the nearby dark souls and activate their corresponding formation cores. After any formation core is activated, the Xuanwu Totem will be complete, and the <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> can be entered.

While the Xuanwu Totem is active, use <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</> to gain hyperbody, and snake bites can be applied in the following ways:
After <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</> lands a hit, apply 1 snake bite to the target with the highest HP.
After <shuzhi>Resistor's</> fifth attack lands its final hit, apply 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
After <shuzhi>Open Clouds</> lands a hit, apply 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
After <shuzhi>Cutting Sand</> lands a hit, add 1 snake bite to the locked-on target.
Snake bite deals devouring damage equal to <shuzhi>150%</> of ATK to the target, restores <shuzhi>12%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and makes the target a Serpent Chain member.

Serpent Chain can cause <shuzhi>30%</> of the actual damage dealt by the Wanderer's main slot weapon to the locked-on Serpent Chain member and <shuzhi>grievous</> to be conducted to all Serpent Chain members (including the locked-on target themselves). There can be up to <shuzhi>4</> Serpent Chain members.
Conduction damage's element type follows the original damage and cannot be conducted again. The total conduction damage within <shuzhi>30</> seconds should not exceed <shuzhi>2,400</> times of the Wanderer's maximum ATK (unlimited in team play). <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> damage cannot be conducted.
After using <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</>, the Wanderer can also trigger <shuzhi>Mighty Wind</>: Serpent Chain members deal damage equal to the number of times devouring damage has been dealt multiplied by <shuzhi>25%</> of ATK to nearby targets (including the locked-on target themselves), then reset the devouring damage count.

skills.name: Ember Mag

Switch modules to change the effects of Cross Snipe and Twilight Arc. Cross Snipe can be used up to <shuzhi>8</> times. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.

Shield Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

skills.name: Erupt
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flame shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. Trigger an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The explosion inflicts a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> on the target, and for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, reduces the target's healing received by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Form: Swing the axe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and reducing the target's healing received for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds by <shuzhi>30%</>.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: Fission
skills.description:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form and smash the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target. Leave a large flame zone for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds upon being hit.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.

skills.name: Seething Rage
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or when <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a flame shockwave, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. Taunt enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, during which gain <shuzhi>15%</> damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted, which last within the area for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Upon pickup, objects provide <shuzhi>10</> seconds of <shuzhi>5%</> damage reduction (stackable) and immediately restore 1 dodge attempt.

skills.name: Electro Field
skills.description: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>-seconds.

First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{16}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{17}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{18}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{19}</>, and launch the target.

skills.name: Flailing Cleave

Hold to attack when airborne or after a single jump to trigger Armor Pummel.

The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Hold attack button to fire <shuzhi>3</> missiles dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to struck target, then explode for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> more damage.

skills.name: Crashing Slash
skills.description:
While using normal attacks, hold the normal attack button to trigger a branch attack.
While in greatsword form, leap and strike the ground to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets.
While in dual blades form, dash forward and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to enemies caught in the attack's path, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them.

skills.name: Hunters Fire
skills.description: Aim and fire at the target to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

skills.name: Heavy System Crash
skills.description: Deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage plus minor knockback to all targets along the route.

skills.name: Heavy System Strike
skills.description:
The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

skills.name: Form Switch
skills.description: Heavy System leaps up and crashes down upon nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets, and changing weapon form. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

skills.name: Maximum Firepower
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and launch a massive salvo of missiles upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

skills.name: Soaring Dragon
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and gather chi. Then smash the ground, causing an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them. During the period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When Phantasia is triggered, if Azure Dragon is currently equipped or if switching to Azure Dragon from another weapon, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>5,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats. This can only be triggered up to 1 time per Phantasia trigger.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Launch a lightning ball ahead.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lightning Flash.
Instantly appear at lightning ball's location, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and produce a lightning pool, then return to the Wanderer's original location. The lightning pool will deal a total DoT equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and continuously draw in nearby targets.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> During Lightning Flash, the Wanderer receives hyperbody. After Lightning Flash lands a hit, receive <shuzhi>1</> stack of Qinglong's Might.
After triggering Lightning Flash, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

skills.name: Pearls & Jades
skills.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

skills.name: Seeing Sights
skills.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

skills.name: Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun
skills.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

skills.name: Thunder Burst
skills.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.
Continuously fire lightning at targets, consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. At the same time, summon <shuzhi>1</> Azura every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds that fire shockwaves, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.
The Wanderer gains a shield equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of Max HP every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>15%</>, lasting for <shuzhi>15</> seconds from the creation of the first shield.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Whenever Thunder Burst's shockwave lands a hit, nearby targets are taunted for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
Every time Thunder Burst produces a shield, nearby teammates will additionally receive a shield up to <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

skills.name: Roving Dragon
skills.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Roving Dragon and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

skills.name: Qinglong's Might
skills.description:
Every <shuzhi>3</> normal attacks landed while using Azure Dragon grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Qinglong's Might, stacking up to <shuzhi>8</> times, for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Each stack of Qinglong's Might reduces the Wanderer's damage taken by <shuzhi>1.5%</>.

skills.name: Azure Moon
skills.description:
An azure dragon soars through the sky. During this time, grant hyperbody to the Wanderer and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. The azure dragon will circle for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. During this time, continuously consume Qinglong's Might and summon up to <shuzhi>8</> lightning strikes. Every lightning strike deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets, and when the azure dragon disappears, deal damage again equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds and this cooldown cannot be lowered below <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Azure Moon can accumulate up to <shuzhi>2</> stacks of skill uses.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When <shuzhi>3</> volt weapons are equipped, after Azure Moon lands a hit, deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>250%</> of ATK to the target every <shuzhi>2</> seconds for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

skills.name: Shimmering Radiance
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Moonstar's Breath, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Recover the Wanderer's HP equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK and remove <shuzhi>16</> points of Graying Bite. Remove delay and gain delay immunity for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

<shuzhi>Passive: Moonstar</>
While <shuzhi>Attack</>/<shuzhi>Balance</> Resonance is active, when <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> lands a hit, increase the Wanderer's ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
While <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</> is active, every time the Wanderer uses <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</>, increase their resistance by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> times. When the Wanderer's HP is lower than <shuzhi>30%</>, gain an extra <shuzhi>40%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, which can be triggered once every <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active, <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance's</> HP recovery heals all teammates instead and when it is used, creates <shuzhi>1</> stack of Moonshield that negates damage <shuzhi>1</> time for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. This effect does not stack, and every use of <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> increases the healing effect of the next use by <shuzhi>20%</>, up to <shuzhi>40%</>. This effect lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Recover HP equal to <shuzhi>150%</> of ATK for the Wanderer and nearby allies when dodging, and remove <shuzhi>8</> points of Graying Bite from the Wanderer. While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active, gain an additional <shuzhi>50</> weapon charge.

skills.name: Reversal Wave
skills.description: Roam ahead several times, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area.

skills.name: Dashing Wave
skills.description: Unleash a water jet, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area and suspending them.

skills.name: Frost Lash

While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks.

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

skills.name: Dancing Drop
skills.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to launch 7 consecutive attacks in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to<shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>.

skills.name: Converging Ripples
skills.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Converging Ripples.
The Wanderer will become airborne and fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

skills.name: Moonrain
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonrain.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets upon reaching the ground, and suspend them.

skills.name: Torrential Convergence
skills.description:
While in mid-air, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Torrential Convergence.
Fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

skills.name: Division
skills.description:
While <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active:
Tap and hold normal attack while on the ground to select a teammate, then release to link the Wanderer to that teammate. When their link is in effect, the pair cannot make a link or be linked again. The link ends when one of the two is defeated/the selected ally has made another link/it exceeds the range.
The linked ally's healing received from the link starter's Moonstar Bracelet is increased by <shuzhi>50%</>.
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</>, an extra <shuzhi>50%</> of resistance is transmitted to the linked ally.
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Balance Resonance</>/<shuzhi>Attack Resonance</>, an extra <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK is transmitted to the linked ally (no more than <shuzhi>20,000</>).
When the linked ally activates <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</>, the outgoing healing effect of the pair is additionally increased by <shuzhi>30%</>.

skills.name: Crashing Falls
skills.description:
Tidal Eruption: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets in the area. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive: Scatter</>
Gain Scatter Technique after equipping <shuzhi>Moonstar Bracelet</>. Up to <shuzhi>2</> out of <shuzhi>6</> Scatter Techniques can be activated via Skills - Settings.
Controls: Tap the special skill button to use the Scatter Technique.
When a Scatter Technique is attached to Crashing Falls, using Crashing Falls will automatically trigger the Scatter Technique, and the skill cooldown will be replaced by the Scatter Technique cooldown.

skills.name: Hydro Focus
skills.description:
Surging Tides: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, increasing all elemental damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.

skills.name: Vortex
skills.description:
Summon multiple waterspouts, pulling nearby targets together and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A large waterspout is formed shortly after, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.
Damage dealt by <shuzhi>Vortex</> counts as skill and discharge damage.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

skills.name: Torrential Force
skills.description:
Bath in Torrents: Gain <shuzhi>60</> weapon charge every second. Increase skill damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>35</> seconds.
Using <shuzhi>Torrential Force</> counts as using the current weapon's discharge skill (without the effect).
<shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> hits reset <shuzhi>Torrential Force's</> cooldown.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

skills.name: Maelstrom
skills.description:
Encompassing Waves: Gain a final damage boost that increases over time, up to <shuzhi>26%</> (maxes out in <shuzhi>10</> seconds). This effect does not stack with repeated uses of <shuzhi>Maelstrom</> and is lost upon switching weapons.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

skills.name: Aqua Shackles
skills.description:
Execute Aqua Prison on the target for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. The target is unable to move or use skills for the duration of Aqua Prison, and their resistance is reduced by <shuzhi>8%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds (doesn't work against Wanderers).
The resistance-reducing effect of <shuzhi>Aqua Shackles</> is doubled while diving.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

skills.name: Wellspring
skills.description:
Arcane Vitality: Gain a (<shuzhi>Max HP</>/<shuzhi>100,000</>)% all elemental damage boost, up to <shuzhi>9%</>. Gain another <shuzhi>7%</> increase to all elemental damage for <shuzhi>20</> seconds when your Max HP is over <shuzhi>1,600,000</>.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

skills.name: Harrah's Embrace
skills.description:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon Harrah to cast <shuzhi>12</> Tempest Rounds, each of which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. During this, the Wanderer gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>7%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds after successfully using Harrah's Embrace. In addition, generate <shuzhi>3</> Crystamax thorns (up to <shuzhi>5</> can exist at one time). Crystamax thorns start with <shuzhi>100%</> Max HP, are unable to be attacked, can only be healed by <shuzhi>Feedback</>, and last for <shuzhi>150</> seconds.
Gain <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Feedbacks</> after Harrah's Embrace lands an attack (can stack up to <shuzhi>4</> times). Lost Art consumes <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Feedback</> every dodge attack, dealing damage to the target equal to the number of Crystamax thorns times <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK, recovering <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP to all Crystamax thorns, and resetting Crystamax thorn location and duration.
After landing a hit with Harrah's Embrace, gain <shuzhi>1</> opportunity to dodge without consuming a dodge attempt.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

skills.name: Pillage
skills.description:
Tap normal attack during the perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging forward) to trigger Pillage, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
Using Pillage can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

skills.name: Swarm
skills.description:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Swarm, summoning two Abyssant illusions which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.
Using Swarm can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

skills.name: Weave
skills.description: When on the ground, holding any dodge can trigger Weave, dashing for a distance toward the sky (does not work in areas where Jetpack can't be used).

skills.name: Seal
skills.description:

skills.description:
Cast the Silent Flow skills to begin charging for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, continuously taunting nearby targets and absorbing damage up to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP. At the end of the charge, deal frost damage equal to <shuzhi>408%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>50%</> of absorbed damage to targets, and <shuzhi>20%</> of the unconsumed value is converted to HP recovery. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Enter Silent Flow when Fortitude Resonance is activated. <shuzhi>Excited Flow: Flashing Stream</> is replaced by <shuzhi>Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream</>. Enter Excited Flow when Fortitude Resonance is not activated.
The Wanderer can gain Sword Shadow, which follows them around when using Saki Fuwa's skills. Sword Shadow will release Surge when the Wanderer uses Saki Fuwa's branch skills or discharge skills, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>175%</> of frost ATK. Cooldown of Surge: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
While in Excited Flow: Sword Shadow will release Flow when the Wanderer deals damage with any weapon, which inflicts damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of frost ATK on the first hit target and recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>57%</> of the damage. The maximum recovery each time cannot exceed <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds.
While in Silent Flow: After Sword Shadow releases Surge, the Wanderer obtains <shuzhi>3</> blocks for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, and the maximum block capacity cannot exceed <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP. Each successful block deals Counterattack damage equal to <shuzhi>225%</> of frost ATK to the target, and the shatter of Surge increases by <shuzhi>100%</> with an added taunt effect.

skills.name: Sparkling Collider
skills.description:
Spark fires out Sparks that last for 15 seconds and bounce between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. Sparks deal more damage the further they travel. Upon landing a hit, they will deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>25</>-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, with each bullet dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>30%</> more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. When Sparks hit targets burned by the Wanderer, they burn or ignite the target once and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together) and will automatically tally again 1 time. The result calculation cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds and the skill cooldown is <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack or Sparks deals damage, the Wanderer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a <shuzhi>0.9</>-second cooldown, for up to <shuzhi>8</> points of Heat. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Wanderer gains the effect Ultimate Heat, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

skills.name: Go, Dolly!
skills.description: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against them, as well as taunting them for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

skills.name: Dodge

skills.name: Supernova

Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams forward before eventually exploding, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. When Sparks hits targets burned by the Wanderer, it burns or ignites the target 1 time and deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are tallied together). The burn tally cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

When enemies in the Green Field lock onto the Wanderer, their movement speed is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>.
Passive: Can be unleashed on the ground or mid-air.
Passive: Immediately break the control if under control effect and automatically release Leafy Green without using any dodge attempts. Skill cooldown lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

skills.name: Moonlight Realm
skills.description:
Create a Moonlight Realm around yourself for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Your attack in the realm is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>, jumping ability increased by <shuzhi>20%</>, and endurance consumption reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Enter the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm. Your fall speed is greatly reduced and you can perform multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target. Upon hit, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and randomly generate <shuzhi>1–3</> epiphyllums.

Passive: In the Moonlight Realm, <shuzhi>1</> epiphyllum will be generated near 1 target every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds. 
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, an extra <shuzhi>50%</> of damage is dealt to enemies with less than <shuzhi>20%</> HP.
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, you will blink away from the target when incoming damage is detected. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Passive: Weapons Master
Flame: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 flame weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Flame: Moonlight Realm. When a target is burned while in Flame: Moonlight Realm, they are burned for an extra <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Targets with shield take an extra <shuzhi>15%</> flame damage. 

Volt: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 volt weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Volt: Moonlight Realm. While in Volt: Moonlight Realm, dodging has a <shuzhi>65%</> chance of not consuming a dodge attempt, dodge attacks deal <shuzhi>5%</> additional damage, and volt damage is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Physical: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 physical weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Physical: Moonlight Realm. While in Physical: Moonlight Realm, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within attack range every second.

Balance: When Shadoweave is paired with any two different elemental weapons (among flame, volt, frost, and physical weapons), the Wanderer's ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</> in the realm, and counted as activating flame, volt, frost, and physical resonance without resonance effects.

During <shuzhi>Mirage Fantasy</> created by <shuzhi>Whirling</>, after any weapon's dodge attack lands a hit for the first time, trigger Flower Graft, creating a Fei Se's Phantasia and Lotus Petals.
<shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</>: Upon creation, Fei Se's Phantasia copies <shuzhi>25%</> of the target's Max ATK and converts it to the Wanderer's <shuzhi>base flame ATK</> (not lower than <shuzhi>3,300</> and not exceeding <shuzhi>3,450</>; this flame ATK will not be reflected on the Wanderer's stats and is unavailable in Apex League) until Fei Se's Phantasia disappears. This is calculated independently for each Fei Se's Phantasia. There can be only <shuzhi>1</> Fei Se's Phantasia at a time.
<shuzhi>Lotus Petal</>: Upon creation, the Lotus Petal count is equal to the number of summons created by the Wanderer's weapons other than Endless Bloom. After creation, the Lotus Petal count does not change with the number of summons. Lotus Petals are considered as summons.

Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and create a Mirage Fantasy, which lasts up to <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
When Whirling is in cooldown, gain the new skill, Lissom. Lissom can be used after the Mirage has been active for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
After the Mirage disappears, immediately refresh Whirling's cooldown. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

During the Mirage:
Every second, deal Soulwear damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets in the Mirage. Soulwear damage counts as normal attack damage.
Every <shuzhi>5</> seconds, inflict Blazing Heart on targets in the Mirage, dealing burn damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK, lasting for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> or <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</> created by the Wanderer in the Mirage, Blazing Heart's damage is additionally increased by <shuzhi>6%</>.

skills.name: Lissom

When Whirling is in cooldown, gain the new skill, Lissom. Lissom can be used after the Mirage has been active for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
Clear all <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasias</> and <shuzhi>Lotus Petals</> in the Mirage created by the Wanderer. Then, shatter the Mirage Fantasy, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the second to the fourth normal attack to trigger Wolfbite.

After triggering Wolfbite, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Upswipe.

Descend from above, gaining temporary invincibility and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending the target.

skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a jetpack to trigger Thick and Fast.
Descend from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> upon landing and suspending surrounding targets.
After triggering Thick and Fast, tap and hold normal attack again to trigger Roar.
Let out a terrifying Roar in all directions and gain temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets and knocking them back.

While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to the seventh Unshackle to trigger Trailing Note.
Roam through the air multiple times and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to surrounding targets.

Each time a target is hit by a normal attack, there is a <shuzhi>50%</> chance to place <shuzhi>1</> musical note on the target that lasts for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> notes.

skills.name: Normal Vesper Attack Passive

<ComLblGreen>Enlightenment</>: Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you carry × <shuzhi>2.1%</> of ATK (no more than 12.6% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.

Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry × <shuzhi>1.5%</> of ATK (no more than 12% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.
<ComLblGreen>Glowing</>: Upon hit, all of Vesper's normal attacks recover HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Vesper's aerial attack and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge to shatter.
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>15%</> loss of Max HP or every <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge gained, obtain up to <shuzhi>5</> Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guards lasts for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. If you have the maximum number of Enlightenment Guards, the newly produced Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>48%</> of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.

Phase 1 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

skills.name: Shimmer
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger 3 mid-air charges. Release to pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

skills.name: Forgiveness Guard
skills.description:
<ComLblGreen>Forgiveness Guard</>: When the healing effect overflows, gain an HP Shield equal to up to <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: The skill is replaced with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>, and the Wanderer earns no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn 1 Forgiveness Guard for each <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP healed, and grant up to 1 Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also, increase Max HP by <shuzhi>10%</> for self and teammates. This effect cannot be stacked.
<ComLblGreen>Attack Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Fortitude Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP per second for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Balance Guard</>: When HP is more than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>. When HP is less than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>10%</>.

skills.name: Starfall
skills.description: Leap toward the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> it. Inflict an Enlightenment mark on the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

skills.name: Shinerise
skills.description: Pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> targets in front, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and summoning up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Blades</> for <shuzhi>75</> seconds (up to 1 Blade every 2 meters). This skill can be used up to <shuzhi>3</> times, with a cooldown of <shuzhi>20</> seconds each time. When 2 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist on the field, a <shuzhi>Clearshine</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the target's ATK. When 3 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist, a <shuzhi>Nebula</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it damages targets within the movement radius, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK × movement distance / <shuzhi>5</>m.

skills.name: Mind Capture
skills.description: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after unleashing <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds and recover <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

skills.name: Chanting Sigh
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

skills.name: Unbridled Flurry
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, then rush to the target and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage, while gaining immunity to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Barrage
skills.description: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, and create a hailstorm at the target location, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The storm has a <shuzhi>10%</> chance to <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Gain cold front, and increase speed by <shuzhi>45%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
